plot: A successful lawyer (Ashkenazi), who has traumatic memories from his army service, is testifying against his best friend from his unit. His wife, a social-worker (Zorer), is trying to save a poor family named Siton (Garti and Adika). The couple's life collapses when the wife get raped by a gang (lead by Abutbul).
title: Rak Klavim Ratzim Hofshi
plot_es: A successful lawyer (Ashkenazi), who has traumatic memories from his army service, is testifying against his best friend from his unit.
